greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Discard the most significant digit when n is expressed in greedy A001563-base (A276326), then convert back to decimal: a(n) = n - A276334(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4320
mathematica: {0}~Join~Table[n - # Floor[n/#] &@(# #!) &@ NestWhile[# + 1 &, 0, # #! <= n &[# + 1] &], {n, 96}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 31 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 30 2016
